SELECT w.WAREHOUSE_ID,
    w.WAREHOUSE_NAME,
    w.ADDRESS,
    IFNULL(FREEZER_YN,'N') AS FREEZER_YN
FROM FOOD_WAREHOUSE w
WHERE ADDRESS LIKE '%ê²½ê¸°ë„%'
ORDER BY w.WAREHOUSE_ID ASC;
